answer: For the immunology segment, Cosentyx net sales for full year 2024, reported on a basis, were USD 2,044 million, and constant currency on a basis, were USD 1,996 million. A year-over-year comparison of 2023 figures to 2024 suggests that reported sales increased by 15% (from USD 1,807 million in Q4 2023 to USD 2,044 million in full year 2024), while constant currency sales also grew by 15% (from USD 1,794 million in Q4 2023 to USD 1,996 million in full year 2024).
